title: 5 Easy Ways to Plan a Productive Week
description:
Has this ever happened to you? ğŸ™‹ â™€ï¸

You really wanna be more productive, so you head over to the very reliable tool that is Google and you start looking up things like tips to avoid distraction, how to schedule your week, and productivity hacks.

You write down a detailed to-do list and you actually begin checking everything off the first week. But a few weeks later, you end up distracted, frustrated, and unproductive yet again.

In todayâ€™s podcast episode, Jordan is dishing out some great tips on how to structure your week in a way thatâ€™s easy and sustainable.

Forget about the cutesy Pinterest tips with the long lists of things you â€œshouldâ€ be doing, and tune in to the episode to learn:

  • What it means to take a grace-based approach to productivity
  • How to create consistent routines for better health
  • Ways you can schedule your week to get the most out of it
  • How to adjust your schedule based on the season youâ€™re in

To get even more tips on how to schedule your week and plan out healthy meals, check out the free Own Your Everyday Way mini-course at learn.theownitacademy.com/oye.
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
